title: Last Siege of Haven
description: The Queen of the Dead has learned the location of Haven, the Undertakersâ€™ secret HQ, and is planning a massive and deadly assault.With the last day of the Corpse War finally upon them, Will and his friends find themselves in a desperate race to close the Rift between worlds and forever kill the Corpses. But can they do it before Haven is overrun?For that matter, can they do it at all?
author: Ty Drago
